oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Book "German Drill-Book"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The multi-page language book for basic German grammar. The lessons for U.S. soldiers include those for German nouns, articles, and pronouns. The "German Drill-Book" was written by H. J. Darnall, Professor of Modern Language, University of Tennessee, Knoxville. The book belonged to Fred Walker Abel a Dayton, Tennessee, native. He was a cook, Co. F, 322th Inf. Regt., 81st Div.
